segments.text: Did you go to see Michael last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , He had just bought a new motorcycle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did he let you ride it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I tried it and I quite liked it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But I still liked it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to buy a motorcycle yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Although motorcycle is nice , I ’ d like to buy a bicycle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But why ? Since you like it so much .
segments.speaker: S1
